summary: A utility script that loads the UltraFeedback dataset, removes entries with excessively long prompts, transforms the data into an unpaired preference representation, and optionally uploads the processed dataset to the Hugging Face Hub, with configurable repository target and parallel processing settings.
business_intent: Facilitate the preparation and sharing of the UltraFeedback dataset for preference‑based model training, streamlining data cleaning, format conversion, and distribution for AI research and development teams.
